ReleaseInfo.Name: HomeGenie
ReleaseInfo.ReleaseNote: - Enhanced parameter statistics now holding up to 1 day of history (HistoryLimit is now expressed in minutes) - Fixed duplicated event raising causing also issues with History/Statistics (#228) - Added new API command /api/HomeAutomation.HomeGenie/Config/Modules.StatisticsGet/<domain>/<address>/<parameter> - Added new API command /api/HomeAutomation.HomeGenie/Config/Modules.ParameterGet/<domain>/<address>/<parameter> (should close issue #206) - Optimized SSE
